description:
**Fix Overview**:

To address the Windows DWM core library information disclosure vulnerability (CVE-2024-30008):

1. Download and apply the relevant KB updates corresponding to your Windows version from the Microsoft Update Catalog.

- For Windows 11 Version 23H2, apply KB5037771.
- For Windows 11 Version 22H2, apply KB5037771.
- For Windows 11 Version 21H2, apply KB5037770.
- For Windows 10 for x64-based Systems, apply KB5037788.
- For Windows 10 Version 22H2, apply KB5037768.
- For Windows 10 Version 21H2, apply KB5037768.

**Details**:
This fix addresses an integer underflow issue in the DWM core library that could lead to information disclosure. Ensure you are running a supported version of Windows as outlined above. For manual installation, download the update package from the provided links:

- [KB5037788](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5037788)
- [KB5037770](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5037770)
- [KB5037768](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5037768)
- [KB5037771](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5037771).

**Preconditions**:
- Ensure your system is updated to a compatible version as specified.
- Backup essential data before performing the update installation.
